com.googlecode.sardine
Interface Sardine

All Known Implementing Classes:
SardineImpl
public interface Sardine

The main interface for Sardine operations.

Author:
jonstevens

exists

boolean exists(java.lang.String url)
               throws SardineException
Performs a HEAD request to see if a resource exists or not. Anything outside of the 200-299 response code range returns false.
